settings.title: We are Sympli.
settings.content:
We‚Äôre inspired by confident women who are constantly exploring and evolving in all areas of life, including personal style.

Like you, we are always experimenting‚Äîpushing boundaries, not always playing by the rules. It‚Äôs a reflection of being a constantly evolving woman, showing the world who you are.
With timeless style. And some edge.

Our story

settings.title: We stand for peace
settings.content:
At Sympli, we stand for peace for all people¬†impacted by the war in Ukraine. We are deeply saddened and touched by the tragic events unfolding overseas.

To show our support, Sympli will donate a portion of proceeds from each order to Samaritan's Purse in solidarity with the women¬†of Ukraine until April 30th, 2022.¬†
We create versatile looks that combine a touch of¬†elegancy elevated with diverse and unexpectedly cohesive patterns.

settings.title: Your style says there is no one quite like you.
settings.content: Sympli creates versatile pieces that best express your unique personal style. Like you, we are always experimenting‚Äîpushing boundaries, not always playing by the rules. It‚Äôs a reflection of being a constantly evolving woman, showing the world who you are. With timeless style. And some edge.

settings.title: Founder Story
settings.content:
The first Sympli piece shipped in 2002.
Our Canadian founder, Jan Stimpson, created a style to inspire women of all ages and body types to be their most confident selves. She started with that ultimate symbol of go-anywhere freedom: the perfect white t-shirt. Building on her success, we‚Äôve grown a devoted following, not just for our unexpected design ethos, but for our quality fabrics, honest fits, and our commitment to comfort.

Comfort equals confidence. In your skin, in your clothes.
It‚Äôs being free to explore the life you‚Äôve created, to embrace it with a spirit of your own. You know exactly who you are.

settings.title: Sign up Now & Get Free Shipping on your Next Order
settings.content:
BE THE¬†FIRST¬†TO KNOW
Receive¬†new collection releases, style tips, promotions and more!

settings.title: We celebrate all women and their confident self-expression.
settings.content:
Inspired by a refined and playful simplicity, we design beautiful pieces with unexpected details that drape in all the right places. Think a refined, eye-catching hem or a striking silhouette. They‚Äôre the clothes you can build a wardrobe around, with the artful twists that are the difference between the clothing you wear, and the favourites you love forever.

Timeless style. Unexpected detail.¬†¬†

No one else is quite like¬†you.
Nothing else is quite like¬†Sympli.
settings.link_text: Learn more about our conscious production.

settings.title: Flattering fit is an evolution, and we don‚Äôt cut corners.
Each style is shaped on multiple women, with diverse figures and body types, to ensure the most flattering fit.
settings.content: We understand that size is just a number, and no two bodies are the same. We don‚Äôt just scale up and down, but shape our styles for each size. We‚Äôre committed to our craft because this specialized approach is the only way to guarantee the perfect fit, every time.

settings.title: We have very high standards, so we only choose and develop fabrics that offer impeccable quality and comfort.
settings.content: Every one of our fabrics is subjected to a rigorous testing process to ensure it can withstand the wash and wear that‚Äôs a part of your everyday life.

settings.title: At Sympli there‚Äôs no mystery involved in any step of the process, and that‚Äôs because we do everything right here at home.
settings.content: On site manufacturing allows our designers intimate access to the factory so that they are able to oversee every step of the production process. Sympli is proud to work alongside our Home Sewing network: a community of entrepreneurs who work on their schedule to sew approximately 85% of our garments while still caring for their families. By keeping production local, our community stays strong. It‚Äôs more than smart business ‚Äì it‚Äôs the only thing that makes sense!
settings.link_text: Learn more about our fabrics & colors

settings.title: Designed with purpose, and crafted with heart.
We build collections
settings.content:
Today Sympli has grown to present a wardrobe of possibility, with endless mix and match potential so that every woman can create a look that is uniquely her own.

We refuse to compromise, which is why our fabrics are rigorously selected for quality, comfort, and drape. With just the right weight for flowing movement and the perfect composition for wrinkle-resistant wear, Sympli ensures that you look your best all day long, no matter where the day takes you!

settings.title: Georgette fabric
settings.content:
Sympli georgette is back with sheer details that drape beautifully and add a dynamic and silky touch to your wardrobe. These styles layer and pair with our signature Jersey collection for an airy ‚Äúfeminine‚Äù look.¬†

Machine wash in cold water, Tumble dry low, Do not bleach, Cold iron.

Available in our seasonal prints for a final touch and upscaled styling sensation.

Fiber Content:¬†100% Polyester

settings.subheading: Perfect weight for effortless comfort and flattering drape.
settings.title: Jersey fabric
settings.content:
Our signature Jersey fabric upholds all the qualities that we value ‚Äì easy care, versatility, wrinkle resistant, and easy-travel-packing.¬† A Sympli classic that continues to evolve season after season through colour and print possibilities. It has just the right amount of stretch for figure-flattering, all-day wear.

¬†A 94% polyester and 6% spandex blend that gives our Jersey the classic feel and draping you know and love with a touch of delightful newness for this Spring-Summer season.¬†

Machine wash cold, Do not bleach, Tumble dry low, Iron at low temperature. Do not dry clean.

Available in a¬†wide selection of colours.

settings.title: Lux Lightweight Cinch Ponte
settings.content:
A lightweight variation of our signature Cinch Ponte fabric offered in Black, White and Navy. Our Lux Ponte offers tailored structure without the stiffness. 4-way stretch fabric moves with your day and keeps its shape.

Machine wash in cold water, Do not bleach, Tumble dry low, Iron at low temperature.

Available in 3 colours.

Fiber Content: 40% Tencel, 47% Nylon, 13% Spandex

settings.title: Wearable palette.
settings.content: Each season we are inspired by trending colours based on Pantone's colour of the year. Our brick red, denim blue and graphite colours will be sure to add some pop of colour to your wardrobe this Fall and Winter.

settings.title: NuORDER Portal
settings.content: Access your Sympli NuORDER Portal, a user-friendly, image-based digital platform to order Sympli products and access marketing materials at a time when we need digital tools more than ever.

settings.title: Become a Retailer
settings.content:
Interested in becoming a retailer? Head to this page below to find out more. 

In this page you will also find all the Upcoming Shows & Markets Dates.

settings.title: Wearable palette
settings.content:
An array of possibilities from neutrals that allow for a classic and timeless touch, to pops of colour for a vibrant and joyful feeling.¬†

Our Spring-Summer 2022 colour palette is inspired by elevated simplicity that can be worn on its own, mixed and matched, or dressed up and down for a personalized styling experience.

The Spring-Summer 2022 prints tie the collection together through subtle colour brushstrokes and playful uniqueness. Sympli is known for its distinctive prints and this season is not the exception. For this artful collection we worked with a local artist to make ultimate designs that speak to the romantic aesthetic behind the Spring assortment.¬†

settings.title: A well-styled and artful capsule thoughtfully made for you.

settings.subheading: Our loyal influencers tried & loved them
settings.title: Shop the looks
Learn more about Lakoo Designs
settings.content:
A joyful and inspiring jewelry brand founded by Mona Saheli. Her mission is to blend happiness and elegance into daily life, to elevate any moment with a little more shine.

Lakoo Designs was born out of Mona’s roots. On the Caspian Sea in northern Iran there’s a tiny region called Gilan. The land is lush warm and bursting with foliage and flowers.

Mona has brought that bustling, jostling excitement of life to Canada by offering a palette of jewels from many cultures.

settings.title: For running around in style
settings.content:
Comfortable styles that have never felt so fine! We are excited to introduce our¬†NEW Rib Group.¬†

In our signature jersey with added white ribbed detailing; this athleisure collection will elevate your every day wardrobe and transform your definition of leisurewear.

Our Rib Group is filled with neutral colours that can be worn throughout any season. Mix and match for flattering silhouettes and the perfect casual look!

Get FREE SHIPPING On Your Next Order.

settings.subheading: Time to let the light in
settings.title: 100% Linen Fabric
settings.content:
Meet Sympli's new 100% Linen Collection. This exciting addition is the¬†natural, light and airy collection¬†you've been waiting for this season.

It has that unmistakable Sympli twist with¬†new tie back details,¬†angles hems and classic shapes¬†offered in our new luxurious pre-washed Linen fabrication.

Machine Wash Cold Water, Gentle Setting with Similar Colours, Do Not Bleach, Hang to Dry, Iron at Low Temperature

Currently Available in Black, White, Blush, Flax and Navy Stripe

settings.subheading: Buy TWO or more regular priced items
settings.title: Get a FREE Whisper Scarf
Sympli x Dress for Success
settings.content:
At Sympli we strongly believe that comfort equals confidence. In your skin, in your clothes. Helping women find individuality and confidence to express who they truly are, has been the¬†heartbeat¬†of everything¬†we do since¬†day one.

We have a long history of supporting and partnering with organizations that share this vision and that seek to provide women with help to find their voices and¬†feel¬†as stunning as they¬†look.

settings.title: Support to our community
settings.content:
Dress for Success Vancouver is a community that empowers women into good jobs, financial independence and personal success by providing them with professional attire, career services, and skills development programs.

We could not think of a more organic and heartfelt partnership that not only aligns in values and vision but, like Sympli, is proudly Canadian.

It is with great joy and excitement that we have partnered with Dress for Success Vancouver to further expand in our shared mission to celebrate women and their confident self-expression.

Sympli‚Äôs monthly clothing donations will add to Dress for Success Vancouver‚Äôs selection of pieces that will provide women with long-lasting wardrobe building pieces that are easy to style. It will also serve them in finding their way back to the workforce with confidence.

settings.title: Signature Clothing Sponsors
settings.content:
The Ambassador Program is a leadership program for clients who have experienced the full suite of Dress for Success Vancouver programs and who are excited to give back by sharing their stories of community, transformation and professional development.

It is with great delight that we partner with Dress for Success Vancouver and their hardworking team in continuing our shared mission of inspiring women to take charge of their lives in style, confidence, and comfort.¬†

We have had the pleasure to spend a day with six of Dress for Success Ambassadors.
Meet them below, photographed by the talented Liz Rosa and pampered by the fantastic Breanne Prostebby

We look forward to a successful and strong partnership¬†of shared beliefs and success stories!

settings.title: Bamboo Fabric
settings.content:
A new fabrication to the Sympli portfolio that offers superior softness and a high-quality touch that are smoother than cotton and that moves with you.¬†

Our Bamboo Collection is made from a blend of bamboo viscose rayon (95%) and spandex (5%) providing a unique texture, a sophisticated airiness and a high-quality feel. Its natural ability of this fabrication to resist odor and moisture, make these styles a wardrobe and travel essential.¬†

Machine wash in cold water. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach. Iron at a low temperature.

settings.title: French Terry
settings.content:
Welcoming French Terry to the Sympli family for a casual and heartwarming feeling. It offers the soft and comfortable texture that we‚Äôve all come to expect from loungewear basics. Our French Terry Collection is smooth and clean. Made primarily of cotton (95% cotton, 5% spandex), it is midweight and oh so cozy!

Lighter than cold-weather sweatpants but heavier than your typical cotton t-shirt. It's moisture-wicking (letting air in and sweat out), absorbent, and keeps you fresh. These new and elevated basics are highly versatile and can keep you cool in warmer weather or warm in cooler weather.

Machine wash in cold water. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach. Iron at a low temperature.

settings.title: Fully Fashioned Sweaters
settings.content:
Our luxurious Fully Fashion sweaters are back in new silhouettes and styles but with the same cozy and elevated touch. A seamless 50% merino, 50% cotton blend that allows for easy-care, comfort, and styling possibilities that match seamlessly with our Jersey.¬†

The versatile softness of our knits is a season essential that no wardrobe should be without! Available in timeless neutrals for harmonious styling and limitless possibilities.¬†

Machine wash. Lay flat to dry.¬†
